snippet: The news and gossip Web site Gawker posted a column on Tuesday from a person who it says is a "longstanding, current employee of Fox News Channel." In the past, Fox News has tried hard to plug any leaks.
abstract: The news and gossip Web site Gawker posted a column on Tuesday from a person who it says is a "longstanding, current employee of Fox News Channel." In the past, Fox News has tried hard to plug any leaks.

headline.main: Fox News Is Said to Have a Mole
